name: Gamify your Habit Tracker
description: This habit tracker can significantly enhance your lifestyle!Gamify your Habit Tracker is digital system in Notion which do not simply track your good habits. Also, help you to break bad habits, reach your goals and keep motivated with a gamified system.What's Included. Track up to 10 good habits and 10 bad habits every day. Visualize and track your weekly, monthly, and yearly performance. (progress tracker) Huge flexibility and neat. Mood Tracker with 16 moods/emotions included. Gamified system
features: Track up to 10 good habits and 10 bad habits every day.; Visualize and track your weekly, monthly, and yearly performance. (progress tracker); Huge flexibility and neat.; Mood Tracker with 16 moods/emotions included.; Gamified system easy to use. (5 levels); Market place to exchange EXP for accessories or wishes.; Plan your day, week and month templates.; Year Report.; User Guide (clip videos)
